validate_module_info(master, mod_data, mod_sn, local_id, version, overwrite_config, home_path)[source]

Validates module info entered and downloads config files from database if successful

Parameters:

  • mod_sn (str) – String containing the global module serial number

  • local_sn – String containing the local (Oxford) module identifier

  • mod_data (gui.test_suite.ModuleTestData)

  • local_id (str)

  • version (str)

  • overwrite_config (bool)

  • home_path (str)

Returns:

if attempting to unintentionally rewrite config files

Return type:

None

regex_validation(local_id, mod_sn, version)[source]

Performs RegEx validation on the local ID and the module serial number, with the option to manually override. Also test to see if the module serial number indicates a v1.1 module or v2. # TODO: FINISH Args:

Parameters:

  • local_id (str)

  • mod_sn (str)

  • version (str)

Return type:

bool
